lcInstruction.p: Here are just a few use cases for where you might use the DITA Learning & Training specialization:

ul.li: Developing content for instructor-led training. You can use the Learning & Training specialization to create the slides used for the presentation as well the printed materials handed out to students, including: course outlines, workbooks, review materials, and pre- and post-assessments.

Developing content for web or learning management system (LMS) delivery. Just as Scriptorium does for LearningDITA, the Learning & Training specialization allows you to prepare and organize learning content and assessments.

If both the training and documentation teams use DITA, both can develop and share content between the groups. While actual presentation and discussion of materials might take different forms, both groups can share common blocks of text, images, tables of data, and the like through DITA warehouse topics.
